The claim was made by a super PAC suppor: specifically the Committee to Restore America's Greatness.
The claim was found on the website stopt: org, which was created by Trump supporter and former campaign operative Roger Stone.
The claim stated that there were over 60: s 2016 Republican primary being tallied for Marco Rubio.
The claim was investigated and verified: which showed that Ted Cruz won with 43% of the vote, followed by Trump with 27% and Rubio with 18%.
